typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		RottenTomato as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
Filter1 derive(Rating = iif(year==1988,1,toInteger(Rating)),
		year = iif(year==1960,2021,toInteger(year))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(year==1988),
	insertIf(year==1960),
	deleteIf(year==1950)) ~> AlterRow1
source1 filter(year == 1988 || year == 1960 || year == 1950) ~> Filter1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'moviesdelta',
	truncate: false,
	mergeSchema: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['movie','year'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		RottenTomato as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MoviesCSVSource
MoviesCSVSource aggregate(groupBy(year),
	avgRatingForComedies = round(avgIf(instr(lower(genres),'comedy')>0,Rating),2)) ~> AvgComedyRatingByYear
MoviesCSVSource aggregate(groupBy(year),
	minRating = min(Rating),
		maxRating = max(Rating)) ~> minMaxRatingByYear
Filter1 derive(Favorite = true()) ~> Favorite
MoviesCSVSource filter(year == 1980) ~> Filter1
AvgComedyRatingByYear sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1AvgRatingByYear
minMaxRatingByYear sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2MinMaxRating
Favorite sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3Favorites

source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		RottenTomato as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'moviesdelta') ~> source1
source1 filter(year != 2021) ~> Filter1
Filter1 aggregate(rowcount = count(1)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
